root.name: MitivDeconvolution
root.description: MitivDeconvolution is a deconvolution tool for widefield fluorescence microscopy that require the knowledge of the PSF.
root.author: mitiv - Ferreol Soulez
root.changelog:
- Version 0.0.1.36 Date 2017-06-13 14:11:39
- Version 0.0.1.35 Date 2017-06-13 11:28:51
Remove everything and left only a message about DEMIC plugins
- Version 0.0.1.34 Date 2016-10-09 18:43:53
- Version 0.0.1.33 Date 2016-10-09 12:15:45
To bypass a class path problem in TiPiSDK all TiPi is embedded into the plugin
- Version 0.0.1.32 Date 2016-10-09 12:05:18
-Fix many bugs after extensive testing at MiFoBio 2016. - Add a non expert mode with standard default values - Fix protocols issues
A major version coming soon.
- Version 0.0.1.31b Date 2016-10-02 13:08:18
Add Eric modification
- Version 0.0.1.30b Date 2016-09-28 16:56:22
fix the output space in convolution
